tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: It is a sign of hypocrisy in an individual if he indulges in tall talk and resorts to swearing oaths to reassure others of the truth of his words. A sincere man is subdued out of fear of God
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Munafiqun, Ayah 2?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: When a man embraces the faith, he makes a sincere vow. Thereafter, different practical occasions arise in life when he is required to act according to his vow
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: A hypocrite protects his interests by his compromising and self-interested approach. ’ In the hypocrite’s eyes, worldly interest is much more important than any religious interest
distractors: This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: According to the tafsir, what should we understand from this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In the eyes of world-loving people, the Migrants seemed, therefore, to be people without honour in comparison with the Helpers who were respectable people
distractors: This verse only discusses worldly matters
This verse is primarily about historical events
This verse focuses on scientific facts

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Munafiqun, Ayah 9?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Man should know that riches and children are not the final goal but the blessings which are given to him so that he may utilise them for God’s work. The biggest problem for a man is the inevitability of the Hereafter
distractors: This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
